content: बहल {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [बंह् --कलच् नलोपश्च] {@--1@} Very much, copious, abundant, plentiful, manifold, great, strong; <ls>U. 1. 38</ls>; <ls n="U.">3. 23</ls>; <ls>Śi. 9. 8</ls>; <ls>Bv. 4. 27.</ls> {@--2@} Thick, dense. {@--3@} Shaggy (as a tail); बहलोत्तुंगलांगूल <ls>Māl. 3.</ls> {@--4@} Hard, firm, compact. {@--5@} Harsh (as a sound). --लः A kind of sugar-cane. --ला Large cardamoms.
